mapper.select: SELECT TC.COURSE_NUMBER as courseNumber, TC.COURSE_TITLE as courseTitle FROM TBL_COURSE_MEMBER_APPLICANT TM LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_COURSE TC ON TM.COURSE_NUMBER = TC.COURSE_NUMBER WHERE TM.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber}
SELECT count(a.MEMBER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_COURSE_MEMBER_APPLICANT a JOIN (SELECT COURSE_NUMBER FROM TBL_COURSE WHERE COURSE_NUMBER = #{courseNumber}) r ON r.COURSE_NUMBER = a.COURSE_NUMBER
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_course_member_applicant(COURSE_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER, COURSE_MEMBER_APPLY_DATE) values(#{courseNumber}, #{memberNumber}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(COURSE_NUMBER) from tbl_course_member_applicant where COURSE_NUMBER = #{courseNumber} and member_number = #{memberNumber}
select a.COURSE_NUMBER, c.course_title from tbl_course_member_applicant a JOIN tbl_course c ON a.course_number = c.routine_number where member_number = #{memberNumber}
